Petra.synopsis: Fallback dialog with Petra.Only triggered if their threeway dialog with Dalyria failed to start.

NoAstarion.synopsis: Dalyria and Petra at the flophouse.They are looking for Astarion at the place where they used to "hunt".This is a dialog for when they meet the player without Astarion.Dalyria tries to seduce the player and invite them to Cazador's mansion, but Petra tells her not to get distracted - they are only here to look for "that person".
NoAstarion.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Vampire Spawns Duo at FlophouseWalk in the direction the player character is facing.Click on Petra or Dalyria.

PAD_SpawnTurnsIntoMist.synopsis: A player character sees a vampire spawn turning into mist, something they shouldn't be able to do.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras.how_to_trigger: Stand near Dalyria and Petras, the vampire spawn in the Flophouse.

Dalyria.synopsis: Fallback dialog with DalyriaOnly triggered if their threeway dialog with Dalyria failed to start.

PAD_HuntingGround.synopsis: Astarion comments on the Flophouse (that it was his hunting ground)

Petra_0.speaker: Pale Petras
Petra_0.text: If you're desperate for company, Sharess' Caress is just across the way.

Petra_1.speaker: Pale Petras
Petra_1.text: Leave me be. I'm waiting for someone - someone far more handsome than you.

NoAstarion_0.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_0.text: We are just leaving. We have a celebration to attend.

NoAstarion_33.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_33.text: One more mark, then we can go.
NoAstarion_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: player is a little far away from the two vampire spawn

NoAstarion_66.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_66.text: The master said we have enough - the Black Mass is ready to begin.
NoAstarion_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: player hides just out of view

NoAstarion_17.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_17.text: It's not for the master, it's for me. I want a beating heart there, ready for me when the Mass is complete and we're finally granted our freedom.

NoAstarion_37.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_37.text: After two hundred years of rats, I think we deserve a real drink.

NoAstarion_12.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_12.text: There is no time, we are expected back at the palace.

NoAstarion_69.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_69.text: Relax, the Black Mass won't start until master drags Astarion from whatever hole he's hiding in. We have time to find one more person.

NoAstarion_25.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_25.text: Somewhere you and your master will never find him.

NoAstarion_8.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_8.text: You don't know what my lord is capable of. You don't know his power.

NoAstarion_55.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_55.text: This is not the time, brother. The master must be told.

NoAstarion_45.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_45.text: Fine. But this isn't over - we'll see you again.

NoAstarion_52.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_52.text: No need to go looking - he'll find you soon enough.

NoAstarion_16.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_16.text: I'd like to see him try, the little worm.

NoAstarion_59.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_59.text: And what do I get if I tell you?

NoAstarion_68.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_68.text: How about we leave your blood inside your body?

NoAstarion_15.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_15.text: He's close. I'll see him at camp tonight.

NoAstarion_2.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_2.text: We should go, brother. The master must be told.

NoAstarion_21.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_21.text: Yeah, let's go deliver the good news.

NoAstarion_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both vampire spawn turn to mist and vanish, leaving just Astarion and the party in the room

NoAstarion_30.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_30.text: I'd be game, if you're looking for volunteers.

NoAstarion_61.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_61.text: Well hello, beautiful! Aren't you a sight to behold?

NoAstarion_62.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_62.text: You must excuse my brother, he forgets that we have a very pressing engagement.

NoAstarion_6.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_6.text: You must excuse my sister, she's a terrible bore.

NoAstarion_51.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_51.text: But you look like someone who enjoys a party. There's a celebration being held in the palace of Cazador Szarr - why not join us?

NoAstarion_24.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_24.text: I'll skip the Black Mass. You will too if you know what's good for you.

NoAstarion_20.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_20.text: As if you know anything about it.

NoAstarion_43.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_43.text: Come brother, we have wasted enough time.

NoAstarion_40.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_40.text: So it seems. I just need a minute, then we can go.

NoAstarion_31.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_31.text: Great! The palace looks out over the Lower City, you won't be able to miss it.

NoAstarion_50.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_50.text: Forgive us for not escorting you there, but my brother and I must attend to another matter first.

NoAstarion_3.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_3.text: I don't know. I don't normally accept invitations from strangers.

NoAstarion_36.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_36.text: Thank goodness we're such good friends, then!

NoAstarion_32.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_32.text: This is not the time, Petras.

NoAstarion_65.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_65.text: Yes, dear sister, I know we have places to be. We'll leave once our good friends here have departed.

NoAstarion_13.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_13.text: I look forward to seeing you at the palace, though. It'll be a once-in-a-lifetime experience, I promise.

NoAstarion_53.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_53.text: I'll pass. Doesn't sound like my thing.

NoAstarion_23.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_23.text: A terrible pity, but if you find yourself in the Lower City, you're most certainly invited.

NoAstarion_29.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_29.text: Are you ready to go now, brother? Have you been rejected enough?

NoAstarion_9.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_9.text: Hello beautiful, I didn't see you there.

NoAstarion_38.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_38.text: We were just discussing a ... celebration being held in the palace of Cazador Szarr.
NoAstarion_38.context: NodeContext: pause before 'celebration'. The event is actually a blood ritual, but they don't want to tell guests that.

NoAstarion_34.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_34.text: You should come! It'll be the talk of Baldur's Gate.

NoAstarion_47.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_47.text: Black Mass? Is that the Ritual of Profane Ascension?

NoAstarion_67.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_67.text: Of course not, we were merely discussing a... celebration to be held in the palace of Cazador Szarr.

NoAstarion_27.speaker: Player
NoAstarion_27.text: Anyone dumb enough to get lured away by you two deserves whatever they get.

NoAstarion_26.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_26.text: I didn't realise we had company.

NoAstarion_7.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_7.text: Please, pay my brother no mind. His imagination - and his mouth - get the better of him sometimes.

NoAstarion_35.speaker: Dalyria
NoAstarion_35.text: But it does not matter, we were just leaving anyway. Weren't we, Petras?

NoAstarion_60.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_60.text: Yes, of course, dear sister. I just need a moment and then we can leave.

NoAstarion_28.speaker: Pale Petras
NoAstarion_28.text: The Black Mass has been two centuries in the making. We can take five minutes to find one more person.

PAD_SpawnTurnsIntoMist_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SpawnTurnsIntoMist_0.text: A vampire spawn turned into mist. Didn't know they could do that.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_2.speaker: Pale Petras
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_2.text: Not long before we leave scouring places like this behind. Part of me will miss it.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_3.speaker: Dalyria
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_3.text: I will not. It is our chance to start over, and I will gladly do so.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_4.speaker: Pale Petras
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_4.text: Do you think the master plans to expand his territory? Take Candlekeep - maybe even Amn?

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_7.speaker: Dalyria
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_7.text: Oh, I'm sure he has plans. But I wouldn't dare guess at them.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_5.speaker: Pale Petras
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_5.text: Just think - soon we'll feel the sun on our skin. After all this time...

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_6.speaker: Dalyria
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_6.text: Haven't we lingered long enough? We should return for the ceremony.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_1.speaker: Pale Petras
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_1.text: We have time - the runaway is still missing, after all. Nothing happens until he's found.

AD_DalyriaAndPetras_0.speaker: Pale Petras
AD_DalyriaAndPetras_0.text: We have time - the master is still prepping our long-lost brother. Or what's left of him.

Dalyria_0.speaker: Dalyria
Dalyria_0.text: Forgive me, but I do not have the time to talk. I am expected at the Szarr palace.

Dalyria_1.speaker: Dalyria
Dalyria_1.text: I will be on my way soon. I do not wish to be late.

PAD_HuntingGround_0.speaker: Astarion
PAD_HuntingGround_0.text: I found so many victims for Cazador here. They're the kind of people no one would ever miss.
